text: The women's 4x100 metres relay event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 22 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Christa Kaufmann Sina Schielke Kerstin Grötzinger Katchi Habel ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Veronica Campbell Nadine Palmer Kerron Stewart Noelle Graham ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Emma Rienas Jenny Kallur Susanna Kallur Linda Fernström ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
